permissions: User must be an admin or an admin member of the broker organization to update a broker equipment classification.
side_effects: Updates broker and/or equipment classification relationships for a broker equipment classification.
validation_notes: Requires broker equipment classification ID argument. At least one of --broker or --equipment-classification must be provided. If provided, --broker and --equipment-classification cannot be empty. Equipment classification must not be a root classification (must have a parent). Each broker can only have one entry for a given equipment classification.

flags.name: --equipment-classification
flags.validation: cannot be empty when provided; must not be a root classification
